Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.\nsell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.\nbuy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.\nbuy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.\nbuy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.\nbuy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.\nround_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.\nreroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.\n\n#Task\nAnalyze the total game state and context above, and respond with the appropriate action to take next."}

**My Balatro Shop Phase: Pluto's My Priority**

Okay, here we are, Ante 6, Round 20, $51 in the bank. I'm focusing on my High Card build, heavily leveraging "Ride the Bus" (no face cards) and scaling "Steel Joker" through "DNA" and "Brainstorm." The deck's pretty hefty at around 82 cards, which helps my "Blue Joker" for chips. My High Card is at Level 10, so leveling it further is top priority.

I've got a killer Joker lineup: DNA and Brainstorm (copying power!), Steel Joker for that sweet multiplier, Ride the Bus adding raw mult, and Blue Joker adding some nice chips. I also have "High Priestess" and "The Tower" as consumables.

Looking at the Shop, I see the "Jumbo Celestial Pack" and the "Celestial Pack", both guaranteed to contain Pluto thanks to my Telescope voucher, since High Card is my most played hand. I'll take advantage of that. The "Burglar" is tempting with +3 hands, but I'm hesitant to lose my discards, especially with some purple seals in play. The "Business Card" is a hard pass since it gives money for face cards, which I'm actively avoiding with "Ride the Bus".

The immediate play is clear: I need to get those Pluto planet upgrades. I also need to clear a consumable slot for future consumables. My first move: Let's use High Priestess. So it's:

`{"action": "use_consumable", "positions": [1]}`

Then, I'll buy and use the packs, getting me closer to leveling my High Card!
